name: shibing624/medical
description: The shibing624/medical dataset is a significant contribution to the field of Chinese medical data. It provides a rich source of data for researchers and developers, including pre-trained data from Wikipedia, instruction fine-tuning data, and reward model data. This dataset is particularly useful for tasks involving text-generation and pre-trained language models, and is a valuable asset for anyone working in the Chinese medical field.
